scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Christopher carrying the Christ Child on his shoulders across a body of water. Saint Christopher, a large bearded man wearing a golden tunic and a red cloak, is wading through blue water, holding a tall staff. The Christ Child, depicted as a small adult with a halo, sits on Saint Christopher's shoulders, with one hand raised in blessing and the other resting on the saint's head. The background is a simple blue sky with some green landscape elements on the right.
